commitResults.messageTitle: change Duke.java to Chattime.java complete ip week2 Level-1
add Week 2 Level 2
add class Task
add Week 2 Level 3
add Deadline.java, Event.java, Todo.java all inherit from Task class
add Week 2 Level 4
done TextUITesting, change Duke in runtest.sh to Chattime, add input.txt and EXPECTED.txt as test input and output
add ChattimeException class inherited from Exception
add Week 2 Level-5
add Week 2 Level 6, use ArrayList to store tasks
modify test input, not implementing enum (A-Enums) because not necessary (based on current implementation of code
Add Level-7 Save in new branch.
Add Level 8 features. Add listTime command to enable date-task search.
Add gradle to project.
Implement OOP structure for the entire project.
Add package chattime with child packages command, exception, parser, storage, task and ui.
Add Level-9 find function.
no message
Add JavaDoc to project files.
Add gradle and checkstyle automation.
Add JUnit test to all public non-void, non-static methods in project.
Package into jar file and set as 'pre-release'.
Check coding standards and conventions. Ignore Javadoc for future branch merging.
Modify all access modifiers in Parser.java to be static. Delete constructor for Parser, create a parseInput method instead to process the user input.
Add CheckStyle to chattime bot.
Add enum TaskType to Task.java (use in /chattime/task package). Modify Deadline class constructor to take time input as varargs.
Add GUI to chat bot. Add `help` command to output user guide.
Fix minor issues, set window to be not resizable.
Fix minor checkstyle problems.

`.chattime.storage.Storage ` `loadData()`: need checking on loaded data                                            length `.chattime.Chattime` `getResponse(String input)`: need checking on                                                   processed commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Lengths of data are specified for different types of tasks.
Processed commands should not be null.

Let's add assertions on lengths of loaded data according to types.
Let's add assertions that cmd should not be null.

The lengths of loaded data and the parsed commands are not accessible
by users, they need to have assertions to ensure that the programs are
running in a normal and good condition.

Assertion error messages are added for clarification.

commitResults.messageTitle: `FindCommand.execute` method : long method `Parser.parse` method : long method `Storage.loadData` method : long method `ChattimeException` class : can have better application of OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
The 3 methods have long methods with LoC > 30, which may reduce the
readability.
The exception class can be use to have a better OOP utilized on
`toString()`.

Let's add `findIn` method to implement the find algorithm for
`FindCommand.execute`.
Let's add `parseAddCommand` and `parseIndexCommand` to `Parser` class
to lightweight `parse` method according to the cases functionality.
Let's add `createTaskFromStorage` method to create different types of
tasks based on the task code in the stored data.
Let's modify the `toString()` method to have a better generalized format
of error message.

Using sub- private functions can help to split the codes and enhance
readability.
Generalizing error messages output style can make the code short and
simple.

Add other minor changes to increase code quality.

commitResults.messageTitle: `FindCommand.execute`: nested for-loop
commitResults.messageBody:
`FindCommand.execute` contains nested for-loop that can be modified
using Streams.

Let's replace the for-loop with Streams.

Structure becomes more compact by using Streams.

Supplier is used to regenerate the Streams.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add `ScheduleCommand` class to show daily schedule in hourly manner.
Modify files to suit the need of `schedule` command.
Fix minor issues.
Modify `gradle.build` to suit jar file. Add `isDuplicates` method in `TaskList` to detect duplicated input.
Modify the GUI to make window resizable, change the window title bar icon, add names under profiles pictures.
Modify some bot-replies to give personality to Chattime.
Modify error handling method of `Storage` to reflect error message as bot reply. Modify time constraints for event, start <= end. Improve coding quality, modify long method.
Add tests to original Junit test files. Modify code according to checkStyle.
Add user guide in `docs/README.md` to help user familiar with Chattime. Clarify commands through instructional images attached. Modify `README.md` to suit Chattime's personality.
Change images. All of them are of own source.
Modify exit `bye` method, user can exit immediately by inputting `bye`.
Minor modification due to checkstyle.
Update README.md
Update README.md
Adjusts code to fix minor violations of javadoc convention.
Update `README.md` in docs.
Adjust README.md
Update README.md
Fix Linux pipeline problem with javafx version.
